data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Jaden Brown is on a sub for Harry Toffolo for Huddersfield.
In the minute 40, Christian Norgaard (Brentford) gets a yellow card.
The away team replace Christopher Schindler with Romoney Crichlow-Noble.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Joshua Da Silva puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Fraizer Campbell is replacing Adama Diakhaby for the away team.
In the minute 69, Brentford make their first substitution with Tarique Fosu replacing Sergi Canos.
The home team replace Ivan Toney with Marcus Forss.
Shandon Baptiste is on a sub for Joshua Da Silva for Brentford.
In the minute 86, Goal! Marcus Forss extends Brentford's lead to 2-0.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-0.
Brentford take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Bryan Mbeumo.
